title: Game Crash After Champion Select
body:
For some reason, League of Legends is failing to start, and immediately after Champion Select, when the game starts, all that occurs is a black window appears, closes, and I am brought to the reconnect screen, with a window asking if I would like to submit a bug report.

My OS is Windows 10, and I have already tried repairing the game files, and changing the compatibility options. I also do not have LoLreplay installed.

replies.body: Did you see a bugsplat error, or something about network connection? This could be caused by either issues, so more info would definitely help.
